attributes.action: Raise The UK National Minimum Wage!
attributes.additional_details:
For ages 24+ I suggest the minimum wage be set at £7.00 per hour. The rise in living costs and petty wages on offer are unacceptable to the working class.
MPs and such backgrounds take shocking amounts of money from us all, and we struggle through life, while they claim for expenses we could only dream of!!

ENOUGH is ENOUGH.
